text: Stanley Lee "Whitey" Von Nieda Jr. (June 19, 1922 â€“ September 6, 2023) is an American retired professional basketball player and coach. He was born in Ephrata, Pennsylvania. In 1950, he began playing for the National Basketball Association with the Baltimore Bullets. Von Nieda turned 100 in June 2022, making him the first NBA player to reach 100 years of age. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2023 deaths Category:American centenarians Category:Sportspeople from Pennsylvania Category:Washington Wizards players
title: Whitey Von Nieda
